reviewText: Every toddler should have this DVD.  It is one of the best from Barney Collection, I have purchased this same DVD for 4 different children.

reviewText: I bought this DVD for my 20-month-old granddaughter, and she, along with the rest of the family, loves it!
Title: Barney: Night Before Christmas

reviewText: This video will be a gift for my 18 month old grandson--- he is definitely a Barney fan.  Fulfills owner expectations!
Title: Barney: Night Before Christmas

reviewText: Even though ther ae plenty of movies available for his age and plenty of tv seasons he really likes Barney and this particular movie.
summary: My toddler grandson asks specifically for this movie
Title: Barney: Night Before Christmas

reviewText: This Barney's Christmas Movie is Very Powerful because it tells and shows what Christmas is all about. Having Wonderful Friends and Family and it shows a few Powerful Scenes in this movie. It brings back so many memories as a Child getting ready for Santa to come and taking pictures with Santa as a Child. I'm glad that I got this movie on DVD.
Title: Barney: Night Before Christmas

reviewText: My kids grew up on Barney, and loved him, until I was crazy!. My 8 month old grand-daughter showed real interest in the Christmas DVD. However, my daughter vowed, if her daughter watched it she couldn't come back...... hence the concept, what happens at grandma's, stays at grandma's!!
Title: Barney: Night Before Christmas

reviewText: Barney is a great movie for the young. It teaches them to love one another, and his movies are very child oriented. I highly recommend this for children.
Title: Barney: Night Before Christmas

reviewText: I bought 2 Barney movies for my 16 month old granddaughter for Christmas because she is so crazy about Barney. Her mother tells me that she will sit still during the whole movie and never move. She started watching Barney when she was 13 months old and her mother said they played it so much that they all knew the words, word for word,so I thought it was time for her to have different Barney movies (the same one playing over and over again was driving her parents crazy!). And of course, she loves this one just as much as she does the one she already had.
Title: Barney: Night Before Christmas
